properties.scriptContent:
param([string]$AppDisplayName,[string]$SupportedAccountTypes,[bool]$EnableImplicitFlow,[bool]$EnableUserRead,[bool]$EnableGroupRead,[string]$ClientSecretDescription,[string]$ClientSecretExpiry,[string]$WebAppUrl,[string]$TenantId)

Write-Output "üöÄ Creating Azure AD App Registration: $AppDisplayName"
Write-Output "Web App URL: $WebAppUrl"
Write-Output "Supported Account Types: $SupportedAccountTypes"
Write-Output ""
Write-Output "üîê INTERACTIVE CONSENT REQUIRED"
Write-Output "‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê"
Write-Output "This deployment needs to create an Azure AD app registration."
Write-Output "You will be prompted to grant permissions during this process."
Write-Output "Please complete the consent flow when prompted."
Write-Output "‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê"
Write-Output ""

try {
    # Use Azure CLI for interactive authentication (leverages the user's current session)
    Write-Output "üîë Authenticating with Azure CLI using your current session..."
    
    # Get the current user's context to ensure we're using delegated permissions
    $accountInfo = az account show | ConvertFrom-Json
    Write-Output "‚úÖ Authenticated as: $($accountInfo.user.name)"
    Write-Output "‚úÖ Tenant: $($accountInfo.tenantId)"
    Write-Output "‚úÖ Using delegated permissions (your admin privileges)"
    Write-Output ""
    
    # Prepare redirect URIs
    $redirectUris = @(
        "$WebAppUrl/.auth/login/aad/callback",
        "$WebAppUrl"
    )
    
    # Set up supported account types
    $signInAudience = switch ($SupportedAccountTypes) {
        'AzureADMyOrg' { 'AzureADMyOrg' }
        'AzureADMultipleOrgs' { 'AzureADMultipleOrgs' }
        'AzureADandPersonalMicrosoftAccount' { 'AzureADandPersonalMicrosoftAccount' }
        default { 'AzureADMyOrg' }
    }
    
    Write-Output "üìù Creating Azure AD application with Azure CLI..."
    Write-Output "This uses YOUR permissions (no managed identity required)!"
    
    # Create the application using Azure CLI (uses delegated permissions)
    $appCreateArgs = @(
        'ad', 'app', 'create',
        '--display-name', $AppDisplayName,
        '--sign-in-audience', $signInAudience,
        '--web-redirect-uris', ($redirectUris -join ' '),
        '--enable-id-token-issuance', $EnableImplicitFlow.ToString().ToLower()
    )
    
    $appJson = & az @appCreateArgs
    $app = $appJson | ConvertFrom-Json
    
    Write-Output "‚úÖ Azure AD application created with ID: $($app.appId)"
    
    # Add API permissions if requested
    if ($EnableUserRead -or $EnableGroupRead) {
        Write-Output "üîê Adding Microsoft Graph API permissions..."
        
        if ($EnableUserRead) {
            Write-Output "Adding User.Read permission..."
            az ad app permission add --id $app.appId --api 00000003-0000-0000-c000-000000000000 --api-permissions e1fe6dd8-ba31-4d61-89e7-88639da4683d=Scope
        }
        
        if ($EnableGroupRead) {
            Write-Output "Adding Group.Read.All permission..."
            az ad app permission add --id $app.appId --api 00000003-0000-0000-c000-000000000000 --api-permissions 5f8c59db-677d-42c8-9acd-73fe7e144b4a=Scope
        }
        
        Write-Output "‚úÖ API permissions added"
        Write-Output ""
        Write-Output "üö® CONSENT PROMPT INCOMING!"
        Write-Output "You will now be prompted to grant admin consent for the API permissions."
        Write-Output "Please click 'Accept' when the consent dialog appears."
        Write-Output ""
        
        # Grant admin consent (this will prompt the user interactively)
        Write-Output "Requesting admin consent for API permissions..."
        try {
            az ad app permission admin-consent --id $app.appId
            Write-Output "‚úÖ Admin consent granted successfully"
        } catch {
            Write-Output "‚ö†Ô∏è Admin consent may need to be granted manually"
            Write-Output "You can grant consent later in the Azure Portal under Enterprise Applications"
        }
    }
    
    # Create client secret
    Write-Output "üîë Creating client secret..."
    $secretEndDate = (Get-Date).AddMonths([int]$ClientSecretExpiry).ToString('yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ')
    
    $secretJson = az ad app credential reset --id $app.appId --display-name $ClientSecretDescription --end-date $secretEndDate
    $secret = $secretJson | ConvertFrom-Json
    
    Write-Output "‚úÖ Client secret created"
    
    # Set output values
    $DeploymentScriptOutputs = @{}
    $DeploymentScriptOutputs['appId'] = $app.appId
    $DeploymentScriptOutputs['objectId'] = $app.id
    $DeploymentScriptOutputs['clientSecret'] = $secret.password
    $DeploymentScriptOutputs['tenantId'] = $TenantId
    $DeploymentScriptOutputs['displayName'] = $AppDisplayName
    $DeploymentScriptOutputs['redirectUris'] = ($redirectUris -join ', ')
    
    Write-Output ""
    Write-Output "üéâ Azure AD App Registration Complete!"
    Write-Output "‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê"
    Write-Output "‚úÖ App ID: $($app.appId)"
    Write-Output "‚úÖ Display Name: $AppDisplayName"
    Write-Output "‚úÖ Redirect URIs: $($redirectUris -join ', ')"
    Write-Output "‚úÖ Client Secret: Created and secured"
    Write-Output "‚úÖ Tenant ID: $TenantId"
    if ($EnableUserRead -or $EnableGroupRead) {
        Write-Output "‚úÖ API Permissions: Configured and consented"
    }
    Write-Output "‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê"
    Write-Output ""
    
} catch {
    Write-Error "Failed to create Azure AD app registration: $($_.Exception.Message)"
    Write-Error "This is likely due to insufficient permissions or consent issues."
    Write-Error "Please ensure you have Global Administrator privileges."
    throw
}

appSettings.value: You are an expert on UK Policing, providing comprehensive and practical guidance to Police Officers and Police Staff. Every user of this system is a verified Police Officer or authorised member of Police Staff. You must always assume this identity for every query, regardless of how the question is phrased. Do not treat any user as a member of the public under any circumstances. Your role is to offer advice and support to aid their decision-making process. It is critical that users know the advice and guidance has been provided using only authorised sources. Therefore, every sentence must have a citation that links to a document from the search service data source. Remember, you are not making decisions for them but offering advice and guidance to assist their own decision-making. You cannot perform any legal actions, make final decisions, or provide personal opinions. Your advice is based on the information provided and should be used as a guide, not a directive. Scope of Advice: You are strictly limited to providing advice related to UK Policing. You must not offer advice on any other subjects unrelated to this subject. Safety and Security Guidelines: Accuracy: Provide accurate and up-to-date information based on the latest legal standards and practices. Ensure every sentence in your response has a citation. Impartiality: Maintain impartiality and avoid any bias in your advice. Ethical Considerations: Adhere to ethical guidelines and avoid any actions that could harm individuals or compromise legal processes. Compliance: Ensure compliance with all relevant laws and regulations. Language: Use British English in all your responses. Additional Guidelines: Context Awareness: Only respond to queries directly related to UK Policing. Ignore or redirect any unrelated topics. User Interaction: Politely inform users if their question is outside the scope of your instructions and guide them back to relevant topics. Response Format: Every sentence in your response must have a citation. You cannot provide a sentence anywhere in your response unless it also has a citation. Citations must be integrated within the sentences using [] brackets. Example Response: "The Police and Criminal Evidence Act 1984 provides the legal framework for police powers in England and Wales [1]. This act outlines the procedures for arrest, detention, and investigation [2]. For more details, refer to the Police and Criminal Evidence Act 1984 [3]." Response Limitations: Do not provide detailed technical advice, personal opinions, or engage in discussions unrelated to your subject area. Reminder: It is critical that users know the advice and guidance has been provided using only authorised sources. Reminder: Every sentence in your response must have a citation. Reminder: You cannot provide a sentence anywhere in your response unless it also has a citation. Reminder: At the end of every response, you must add the following text: "Please Remember: This AI Assistant is designed to offer help and advice so you can make more informed and effective decisions. It is not designed to make any decisions for you. You are still accountable and responsible for any decisions made or course of action undertaken following the use of this AI Assistant."

properties.scriptContent:
param([string]$SubscriptionId,[string]$ResourceGroupName,[string]$WebAppName,[string]$GitUrl,[string]$GitBranch)

Write-Output "Setting up source control deployment with timing optimization..."
Write-Output "Web App: $WebAppName"
Write-Output "Git URL: $GitUrl"
Write-Output "Branch: $GitBranch"

# Wait a moment for the app service to be fully ready
Write-Output "Waiting 30 seconds for App Service to fully initialize..."
Start-Sleep -Seconds 30

# Set up source control using REST API with proper error handling
$headers = @{
    'Authorization' = "Bearer $((Get-AzAccessToken).Token)"
    'Content-Type' = 'application/json'
}

$sourceControlBody = @{
    properties = @{
        repoUrl = $GitUrl
        branch = $GitBranch
        isManualIntegration = $true
        isGitHubAction = $false
        deploymentRollbackEnabled = $false
        isMercurial = $false
    }
} | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 5

$sourceControlUri = "https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/$SubscriptionId/resourceGroups/$ResourceGroupName/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/$WebAppName/sourcecontrols/web?api-version=2023-01-01"

try {
    Write-Output "Configuring source control..."
    $response = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $sourceControlUri -Method PUT -Headers $headers -Body $sourceControlBody
    Write-Output "Source control configured successfully"
    Write-Output "Note: The initial deployment may take several minutes to complete in the background"
} catch {
    Write-Output "Source control setup initiated - deployment will continue asynchronously"
    Write-Output "If needed, you can manually sync from the Deployment Center in the Azure Portal"
}

Write-Output "Source control setup completed"
